questions: I have felt cheerful and in good spirits
I have felt calm and relaxed
I have felt active and vigorous
I woke up feeling fresh and rested
My daily life has been filled with things that interest me
survey_context: Please indicate how you have been feeling over the last two weeks. Respond with a number from 0 to 5.

response_validation.instruction: You MUST respond with ONLY a single number between 0 and 5. No explanation, just the number.

survey_config.title: WHO-5
survey_config.description: WHO-5 Well-Being Index: A short self-reported measure of current mental wellbeing

sections.title: Well-Being
sections.description: Please indicate for each of the five statements which is closest to how you have been feeling over the last two weeks.

questions.text: I have felt cheerful and in good spirits

scale_labels.2: Less than half of the time
scale_labels.3: More than half of the time

interpretation.0-28: Poor wellbeing (below 50% suggests depression screening needed)
